resources.string: Cookbook app is a recipe application running on the android platform. The application runs on android devices above version 5.0. Developed using Kotlin, the application utilizes the latest material design techniques.

Users need to sign up using email and password so as to use the application, the user then logins and can be able to create, read, update and or delete menu items. The users while creating a recipe needs to input all the steps and ingredients and upload photos
